logentry.msg: JCR: store meta data as JCR properties. This required to change the return type of MetaDataManager methods to the MetaData interface.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: The repository node is now MetaDataOwner, which allows to provide custom MetaDataManagers at the repository layer.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Introduced RepositoryManager service. This service is the single entry point for repository manipulation, because RepositorySource handling doesn't take care of meta data (for instance JCR properties).

logentry.msg: Introduced RepositoryManager service. This service is the single entry point for repository manipulation, because RepositorySource handling doesn't take care of meta data (for instance JCR properties).

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Use path from context://lenya in usecase view template URIs. This allows to provide usecase views by publets. The JCR import usecase view was moved to the JCR publet.

logentry.msg: Allow internal calls from usecases to publets

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Added usecase for JCR import+export (see bug #36273). Credits to Felix Roethenbacher.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Navigation visibility checkbox: Don't change order of <option> elements, but add a @selected attribute for consistency reasons

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: TreeSiteManager: save XML when node label was removed. This fixes bug #36297.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Added usecase GUI manager to allow dynamic assembly of tabs in admin and site environments. This will allow to register new tabs by modules using XPatch files. Furthermore, tabs are now displayed / hidden based on access rights and executability, similar to the menubar.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Display JCR usecase in admin area tab.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Don't apply admin menu for each publet (fixes bug #36277), don't show "New ..." items from publets in admin menu

logentry.author: chestnut
logentry.msg: Fixes ability to use the AC Live tab to restrict access to a page or group of pages in the live area

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Add JCR workspace file to source. This fixes bug #36334. Credits to Felix Roethenbacher.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Updated libraries to Cocoon versions

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Instantiator: Don't add additional <templates> element if it already exists

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Template manager: recurse into publication templates, this fixes bug #36304

logentry.author: thorsten
logentry.msg: Limited support for cforms. Right now it is *not* possible to add custom flow snippets this will have to change in the future.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Workflow - RoleCondition uses PolicyManager to check actual policy of a document instead of request policy. This fixes bug #36358.

logentry.author: thorsten
logentry.msg: Added full cform support inclusive custom flow snippet. Thanks to Jason Johnston, who told me the 'new Function' trick on cocoon-dev.

logentry.author: thorsten
logentry.msg: added a generic variable that can be used within cforms

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Added lenyadoc:// protocol publet. This fixes bug #36360. Thanks to Felix Roethenbacher.

logentry.msg: sample JCR repo config added such that Lenya 1.2.x can be run with Cocoon 2.1.x

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Refactored repository session handling. Switched from PublicationFactory to PublicationManager Avalon service. Add DocumentIdentifier to reduce document handling costs. This generates a performance improvement.

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: [minor change] simplified code, removed accidentially committed error log

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: [minor change] code cleanup, javadoc fixes

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Removed non-url methods from usecase resolver. This way, it doesn't have to be Contextualizable and can be ThreadSafe (performance issue)

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: [minor change] cleaned up document builder code to use URLInformation, simplified WorkflowMenuTransformer code

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Performance: Attach page envelope to request, lazy loading for usecase parameters

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Performance: added workflow schema cache

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Store parametersInitialized as parameter to avoid re-initialization when UsecaseProxy accesses getTParameterNames()

logentry.author: michi
logentry.msg: thanks to Gregor Imboden the one form editor is able to save again

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Removed workflow situation. The situation information is now implicitely provided by the workflowable object. This allows to get rid of WorkflowManager.getSituation(), which required it to be Contextualizable (which fails with pooling).

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: [minor change] removed obsolete workflow classes

logentry.author: andreas
logentry.msg: Avoid NPE when DocumentHelper passes DTD information to the transformer. This fixes bug #36419. Thanks to Felix Roethenbacher.

logentry.author: edith
logentry.msg: Fix encoding problem of the mail subject

logentry.author: thorsten
logentry.msg: Fixed the cform integration. I needed to switch the position of the binding to make it possible to load values into the form
